attributes.action: Sack the "Gang of Four" heads of Thanet Council for allowing pollution and systemic failure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Poisoned drinking water.

China-Gate.

Manston airport and Infratil pollution and repeated safety breaches.

Total mismanagement and simple deceit at the Audit Commission's "borttom 10%" of UK councils.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
